## FlowBoxSelection class

Represents a selection inside a flow box

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @sealed */
export declare class FlowBoxSelection extends FlowBoxSelectionBase 
```
<b>Extends:</b> FlowBoxSelectionBase
